Item.sqlserver_body:
/* name: activity_status_prepare_rollup solution: Project purpose: Should be run before activity_status_rollup.xml!!!Drops activity_status_rollup and select_wbs_element_pure_rollup_values procedures if already created.*/
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id('innovator.activity_status_rollup') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) BEGIN DROP PROCEDURE innovator.activity_status_rollup END IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id('innovator.select_wbs_element_pure_rollup_values') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) BEGIN DROP PROCEDURE innovator.select_wbs_element_pure_rollup_values END
Item.name: activity_status_prepare_rollup
